# HUD::FLASH_MINIMAP_DISPLAY_WITH_COLOR

## Parameters
* **HUD_COLOURS** flashColour

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
flashes the minimap display using the color specified
